data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Oise, Hauts-de-France, France to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Oise, Hauts-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Oise.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Oise, Hauts-de-France, France humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Oise that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Soninke people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Oise, Hauts-de-France, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Oise, Hauts-de-France, France.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Oise, Hauts-de-France, France has a population of 821,600.

We estimate Oise has 10,095 people who might know Jesus, 502,425 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 309,080 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Oise that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
